fields.headline: Wikipedia fundraising drive
fields.bodyText: "Thanks to a generous grant from the Lounsbery Foundation, we can cover our budget without raising substantially more funds than in the last quarter. In all, we will need $75,000 in donations to reach our goals this quarter. You helped us raise over $50,000 in our last fund drive. Every little bit helps -- most donations we receive are the equivalent of $20 or less," says Wikipedia.
